GSP30parmartu:0: paraṃ parasthaṃ gahanād anādim ekaṃ niviṣṭaṃ bahudhā guhāsu /
GSP30parmartu:1: sarvālayaṃ sarvacarācarasthaṃ tvām eva śambhuṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye // 1 //
GSP30parmartu:5: ādhārakārikābhiḥ taṃ gurur abhibhāṣati sma tatsāram /
GSP30parmartu:8: śaktir māyā prakṛtiḥ pṛthvī ceti prabhāvitaṃ prabhuṇā // 4 //
GSP30parmartu:10: bhoktā ca tatra dehī śiva eva gṛhītapaśubhāvaḥ // 5 //
GSP30parmartu:13: gacchati gacchati jala iva himakarabimbaṃ sthite sthitiṃ yāti /
GSP30parmartu:15: rāhur adṛśyo 'pi yathā śaśibimbasthaḥ prakāśate tadvat /
GSP30parmartu:17: ādarśe malarahite yadvad vadanaṃ vibhāti tadvad ayam /
GSP30parmartu:22: yat paratattvaṃ tasmin vibhāti ṣaṭṭriṃśadātma jagat // 11 //
GSP30parmartu:24: bhāti vibhāgenaiva ca parasparaṃ darpaṇād api ca // 12 //
GSP30parmartu:26: anyonyaṃ ca tato 'pi ca vibhaktam ābhāti jagad etat // 13 //
GSP30parmartu:31: māyāparigrahavaśād bodho malinaḥ pumān paśur bhavati /
GSP30parmartu:33: adhunaiva kiṃcid evedam eva sarvātmanaiva jānāmi /
GSP30parmartu:34: māyāsahitaṃ kañcukaṣaṭkam aṇor antaraṅgam idam uktam // 17 //
GSP30parmartu:35: kambukam iva ta.ṅdulakaṇaviniviṣṭaṃ bhinnam apy abhidā /
GSP30parmartu:41: eṣāṃ grāhyo viṣayaḥ sūkṣmaḥ pravibhāgavarjito yaḥ syāt /
GSP30parmartu:42: tanmātrapañcakaṃ tat śabdaḥ sparśo maho raso gandhaḥ // 21 //
GSP30parmartu:44: abhyeti nabhaḥ pavanas tejaḥ salilaṃ ca pṛthvī ca // 22 //
GSP30parmartu:45: tuṣa iva ta.ṅdulakaṇikām āvṛṇute prakṛtipūrvakaḥ sargaḥ /
GSP30parmartu:47: param āvaraṇaṃ mala iha sūkṣmaṃ māyādikañcukaṃ sthūlam /
GSP30parmartu:49: ajñānatimirayogād ekam api svaṃ svabhāvam ātmānam /
GSP30parmartu:52: tadvad avasthā bhedāḥ sarve paramātmanaḥ śambhoḥ // 26 //
GSP30parmartu:54: vyavahāramātram etat paramārthena tu na santy eva // 27 //
GSP30parmartu:55: rajjvāṃ nāsti bhujaṅgas trāsaṃ kurute ca mṛtyuparyantam /
GSP30parmartu:56: bhrānter mahatī śaktir na vivektuṃ śakyate nāma // 28 //
GSP30parmartu:58: varṇāśramādi cātmany asad api vibhramabalād bhavati // 29 //
GSP30parmartu:59: etat tad andhakāraṃ yad bhāveṣu prakāśamānatayā /
GSP30parmartu:61: timirād api timiram idaṃ ga.ṅdasyopari mahān ayaṃ sphoṭaḥ /
GSP30parmartu:64: ātmānam veṣṭayate citraṃ jālena jālakāra iva // 32 //
GSP30parmartu:68: bhānti turīye dhāmani tathāpi tair nāvṛtaṃ bhāti // 34 //
GSP30parmartu:69: jāgrad viśvaṃ bhedāt svapnas tejaḥ prakāśamāhātmyāt /
GSP30parmartu:70: prājñaḥ suptāvasthā jñānaghanatvāt tataḥ paraṃ turyam // 35 //
GSP30parmartu:73: ekasmin ghaṭagagane rajasā vyāpte bhavanti nānyāni /
GSP30parmartu:75: śānte śānta ivāyaṃ hṛṣṭe hṛṣṭo vimohavati mūḍhaḥ /
GSP30parmartu:76: tattvagaṇe sati bhagavān na punaḥ paramārthataḥ sa tathā // 38 //
GSP30parmartu:77: yad anātmany api tadrūpāvabhāsanaṃ tat purā nirākṛtya /
GSP30parmartu:81: pṛthivī prakṛtir māyā tritayam idaṃ vedyarūpatāpatitam /
GSP30parmartu:85: tad brahma paraṃ śuddhaṃ śāntaṃ abhedātmakaṃ samaṃ sakalam /
GSP30parmartu:87: iṣyata iti vedyata iti saṃpādyata iti ca bhāsvarūpeṇa /
GSP30parmartu:88: aparāmṛṣṭaṃ yad api tu nabhaḥprasūnatvam abhyeti // 44 //
GSP30parmartu:91: punar api ca pañcaśaktiprasaraṇakrameṇa bahir api tat /
GSP30parmartu:95: mayy eva bhāti viśvaṃ darpaṇa iva nirmale ghatādīni /
GSP30parmartu:96: mattaḥ prasarati sarvaṃ svapnavicitratvam iva suptāt // 48 //
GSP30parmartu:97: aham eva viśvarūpaḥ karacaranādisvabhāva iva dehaḥ /
GSP30parmartu:98: sarvasmin aham eva sphurāmi bhāveṣu bhāsvarūpam iva // 49 //
GSP30parmartu:101: itthaṃ dvaitavikalpe galite pravilaṅghya mohinīṃ māyām /
GSP30parmartu:102: salile salilaṃ kṣīre kṣīram iva brahmaṇi layī syāt // 51 //
GSP30parmartu:104: kaḥ śokaḥ ko mohaḥ sarvaṃ brahmāvalokayataḥ // 52 //
GSP30parmartu:105: karmaphalaṃ śubham aśubhaṃ mithyājñānena saṃgamād eva /
GSP30parmartu:111: jñānaprāptau kṛtam api na phalāya tato 'sya janma katham /
GSP30parmartu:115: ātmajño na kutaścana bibheti sarvaṃ hi tasya nijarūpam /
GSP30parmartu:116: naiva ca śocati yasmāt paramārthe nāśitā nāsti // 58 //
GSP30parmartu:118: aham eveti maheśvarabhāve kā durgatiḥ kasya // 59 //
GSP30parmartu:119: mokṣasya naiva kiṃcid dhāmāsti na cāpi gamanam anyatra /
GSP30parmartu:124: jñānāgnidagdham evaṃ karma na janmapradaṃ bhavati // 62 //
GSP30parmartu:132: katham iva saṃsārī syād vitatasya kutaḥ kva vā saraṇam // 66 //
GSP30parmartu:133: iti yuktibhir api siddhaṃ yatkarma jñānino na saphalaṃ tat /
GSP30parmartu:134: na mamedam api tu tasyeti dārḍhyato na hi phalaṃ loke // 67 //
GSP30parmartu:137: aśnan yad vā tad vā saṃvīto yena kenacic chāntaḥ /
GSP30parmartu:140: paramārthavin na puṇyair na ca pāpaiḥ spṛśyate vimalaḥ // 70 //
GSP30parmartu:145: stutyaṃ vā hotavyaṃ nāsti vyatiriktam asya kiṃcana ca /
GSP30parmartu:146: stotrādinā sa tuṣyen muktas tan nirnamaskṛtivaṣaṭkaḥ // 73 //
GSP30parmartu:148: nijam anyad atha śarīraṃ ghaṭādi vā tasya devagṛham // 74 //
GSP30parmartu:153: dhyānam anastamitaṃ punar eṣa hi bhagavān vicitrarūpāṇi /
GSP30parmartu:156: antarbodhe parivartayati ca yat so 'sya japa uditaḥ // 78 //
GSP30parmartu:157: sarvaṃ samayā dṛṣṭyā yat paśyati yac ca saṃvidaṃ manute /
GSP30parmartu:160: rasayati ca yat tad etad vratam asya sudurlabhaṃ ca sulabhaṃ ca // 80 //
GSP30parmartu:164: nirupamaparamānandaṃ yo vetti sa tanmayo bhavati // 82 //
GSP30parmartu:165: tīrthe śvapacagṛhe vā naṣṭasmṛtir api parityajan deham /
GSP30parmartu:178: prāptaḥ sa eva pūrvaṃ svargaṃ narakaṃ manuṣyatvam // 89 //
GSP30parmartu:179: antyaḥ kṣaṇas tu tasmin puṇyāṃ pāpāṃ ca vā sthitiṃ puṣyan /
GSP30parmartu:180: mūḍhānāṃ sahakārībhāvaṃ gacchati gatau tu na sa hetuḥ // 90 //
GSP30parmartu:183: svargamayo nirayamayas tad ayaṃ dehāntarālagaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP30parmartu:185: evaṃ jñānāvasare svātmā sakṛd asya yādṛg avabhātaḥ /
GSP30parmartu:186: tādṛśa eva tadāsau na dehapāte 'nyathā bhavati // 93 //
GSP30parmartu:189: sa kathaṃ vigrahayoge sati na bhavet tena mohayoge 'pi /
GSP30parmartu:191: paramārthamārgam enaṃ jhaṭiti yadā gurumukhāt samabhyeti /
GSP30parmartu:195: tasya tu paramārthamayīṃ dhārām agatasya madhyaviśrānteḥ /
GSP30parmartu:199: paramārthamārgam enaṃ hy abhyasyāprāpya yogam api nāma /
GSP30parmartu:201: viṣayeṣu sārvabhaumaḥ sarvajanaiḥ pūjyate yathā rājā /
GSP30parmartu:203: mahatā kālena punar mānuṣyaṃ prāpya yogam abhyasya /
GSP30parmartu:204: prāpnoti divyam amṛtam yasmād āvartate na punaḥ // 102 //
GSP30parmartu:205: tasmāt sanmārge 'smin nirato yaḥ kaścid eti sa śivatvam /
GSP30parmartu:206: iti matvā paramārthe yathā tathāpi prayatanīyam // 103 //
GSP30parmartu:209: āryāśatena tad idaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ śāstrasāram atigūḍham /
